item.title: OpenPose_Usage
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. KeyPoint Exact 1.1. VideoHandle #with face and hands bin\OpenPoseDemo.exe --video examples\media\video.avi --face --hand # Only body ./build/examples/openpose/openpose.bin --video examples/media/video.avi --write_json output/ --display 0 --render_pose 0 # Body + face + hands ./build/examples/openpose/openpose.bin --video examples/media/video.avi --write_json output/ --display 0 --render_pose 0 --face --hand #save to json and video ./build/examples/openpose/openpose.bin --video examples/media/video.avi --write_video output/result.avi --write_json output/ 1.2. Webcam_Handle :: With face and hands bin\OpenPoseDemo.exe --face --hand 1.3. Images_Handle :: With face
